text:
Ombudsman Order 2004

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order under section 4 of the Ombudsman Act 1978 .

12 March 2004

Richard Butler

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

Judy Jackson

Minister for Justice and Industrial Relations

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Ombudsman Order 2004 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Act
    In this order, the Ombudsman Act 1978 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Ombudsman Act 1978 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 17 March 2004

This order is administered in the Department of Justice.
